entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, who is being displayed like a freak by Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who has decided to display him like a freak.

entities.name: zacharias smith
entities.description: A student who is present at the gathering and is gazing intently at Harry.

entities.name: patronus
entities.description: A magical creature that can be produced by wizards to defend against Dementors.

relationships.description: Harry feels that Hermione is responsible for displaying him like a freak.
Zacharias Smith is gazing intently at Harry.
Hermione mentions the Patronus in her explanation of defense classes.
Harry is able to produce a Patronus.
